meta.content: The Greene County Tech School District is committed to excellence in working with parents, staff, and community members in Paragould, Arkansas and around North East Arkansas.

div.p:
The Greene County Tech School District is dedicated to meeting the needs of students. Researching and implementing the best educational practices will prepare students to excel in current and future endeavors. The Greene County Tech School District is committed to excellence in working with parents, staff, and community members. The Greene County Tech School District pledges to continue on the path of excellence by providing the opportunities and facilities to
